module.name: an_productattributes
module.displayName: Show attribute combinations in products list & Add to cart
module.description: Display product combinations, discounts, availability and the «Add to cart» button — make users able to make a purchase and continue browsing the catalog. Configure view type and customize combination captions and labels.
module.author: anvanto
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall?
